alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Madison; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 2:01PM CDT until March 31 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Polk County in central Iowa... Madison County in south central Iowa... Southeastern Dallas County in central Iowa... Northwestern Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 201 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Winterset, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... De Soto, Van Meter and Badger Creek State Park around 215 PM CDT. Jordan Creek Town Center around 220 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Waukee. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 57 and 70. Interstate 80 between mile markers 107 and 118. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and south central Iowa.
